Simi_Valley.Bard Lake: Bard Lake, also known as Wood Ranch Reservoir, is a 231-acre reservoir which is the largest lake in Simi Valley, California. It is situated near the intersection of Olsen Road and Moorpark Freeway, near the border between Simi Valley and Thousand Oaks. Built in 1965, Bard Lake is a 146-feet high reservoir with a capacity of 11,000 acre-feet (3.3 billion gallons).
